introduce: "Code Time" is an application for programmers. We conduct log collection and real-time analysis of user data and provide the most detailed report and the most beautiful interface to help programmers understand their programming history. We hope that users will be more passionate about programming with this application and contribute to the community.
not found data: No data record was found, please get token and apply it to the editor extension.
refresh token desc 1: You can update your Token here if you find that it has been leaked or used by others.
refresh token desc 2: Once refreshed, the Token in the editor plug-in needs to be reset.
token desc: You can get token here, and token can be used in the configuration of editor extensions to identify users and record their coding actions.
